pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access to the 'Figma' API // The goal of Rigma is to provide a user friendly client to the 'Figma' API https://www.figma.com/developers/api. It uses the latest `httr2` for a stable interface with the REST API. More than 20 methods are provided to interact with 'Figma' files, and teams. Get design data into R by reading published components and styles, converting and downloading images, getting access to the full 'Figma' file as a hierarchical data structure, and much more. Enhance your creativity and streamline the application development by automating the extraction, transformation, and loading of design data to your applications and 'HTML' documents.
